testcase.name: Prouser Submit a Claim as passenger in bus
testcase.system-out: Given prouser logins into whiplash application..............................passed When prouser enter all mandatory details for claim creation as 'The driver' and 'YES' and 'NO'.passed Then claim is created for prouser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA disputes causation and admits part liability
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When TPA accepts full liability.............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: Prouser uploads medical Report with waitout prognosis and release report to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives claim..............................................passed When prouser uploads the medical report with waitout prognosis 'Pending-Medical' and decides to waitout.passed Then report is uploaded and sent to compensator.............................passed

testcase.name: Prouser proceeds with offer during prognosis period
testcase.system-out: Given claimant is in prognosis period.......................................passed When claimant decides to proceed with offer during prognosis period.........passed Then medical report is uploaded and offer request is sent to compensator....passed

testcase.name: Prouser rejects the first offer to Compensator
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives new offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' reject the offer.............................................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: TPA reject claimant counter offer and makes new offer(Second offer)
Prouser rejects the second offer to Compensator
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives new offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' reject the offer.............................................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: TPA reject claimant counter offer and makes new offer(Third offer)
Prouser rejects the third offer to Compensator
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives new offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' reject the offer.............................................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: TPA decides to withdraw the offer
testcase.system-out: Given TPA has made first offer to claimant..................................passed When TPA withdraws the offer at claim 'Pending-RespondCounter'..............passed Then TPA gets an option to replace the offer................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant goes to court to value claim
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' decided to go to court......................................passed When 'prouser' goes to court for final offer................................passed Then Claimant selection to go to court is confirmed.........................passed

testcase.name: Claimant answers NVC
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' decided to go to court......................................passed When 'prouser' answers NVC questions........................................passed Then Acknowledgement will be sent to compensator............................passed

testcase.name: Compensator removes the claim from portal
testcase.system-out: Given TPA does not respond to NVC...........................................passed When TPA removes the claim from portal......................................passed Then the claim is removed from portal and closed............................passed

testcase.name: The claim is moved to 'Resolved-Removed'
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' goes to court...............................................passed When prouser claim goes to dispute at court at 'Resolved-Removed'...........passed Then the claim will be resolved at court....................................passed
